summary: This is an email chain from February 5, 2020, discussing efforts to re-engage and interview a witness or associate following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest. The sender references a previous interview in July, seeks confirmation of the individual's address and contact information, and proposes a follow-up interview for the following Wednesday.

events.title: Email coordination for witness re-engagement
events.description: Email correspondence discussing plans to re-engage and interview an individual who was previously interviewed in July after Epstein's arrest.

events.title: Previous interview after Epstein's arrest
events.description: An individual was interviewed in July following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated February 5, 2020, concerning follow-up investigative efforts.
It references a previous interview conducted in July with an individual, which occurred after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
The investigative team is seeking to confirm the individual's address and contact information to schedule another interview.
The text indicates redactions or missing information, as seen with 'both ■ •' and garbled text like 'Sub'ect:' and 'messa.te'.
